a.style: font-family:'Playfair Display', Georgia, 'Times New Roman', 'Liberation Serif', serif

text.tspan: Prevalence of developmental intellectual disability in men vs. women,
Prevalence of "idiopathic developmental intellectual disability", which is a category of disorders defined by delayed or impaired
speech, language, motor condition, and visuospatial skills.
Data source: IHME, Global Burden of Disease Study (2019)
Note: To allow for comparisons between countries and over time, this metric is age-standardized.
